page.title: 07WATER SUPPLIES
page.content: Water supplies are often a problem in limestone areas as the rock is permeable. However,on the edge of our area a ridge of impermeable gritstone appears and it is here that the reservoir was built in 1908. It was built because the population of Buxton was increasing as it became a more popular tourist, residential and commercial centre. The capacity of the reservoir is{54 {million gallons.}The area of water at the top is{4.4 hectacres} and it is{ {9.3 metres}at its deepest point. Some water comes from local streams and some is pumped from a borehole. There is{treatment plant}which employs 2 men. There water is treated with lime to correct the PH & with chlorine {Severn Trent Water Authority}own it.
